column3: Works for me, though isn't the standard to check for **WXMSW** instead of WIN32 even on bitcoind in most of the code?\n
BlueMatt is right-- #ifndef **WXMSW** would be more consistent with the rest of the code.\n

Pulled, after testing on multiple machines.

Also, I modded the commit slightly, to call setsid() inside ui.cpp, which is a second Daemonize site.
